titlestmt.titleproper: Photographs Of Ship Construction At The Standifer Wood Shipyard Located In Portland, Oregon1917-1918.
Photographs Of Ship Construction At The Standifer Wood Shipyard Located In Portland, Oregon

did.unittitle: Photographs of ship construction at the Standifer Wood Shipyard located in Portland, Oregon
did.abstract: Thirty two (32) B W photoprints of ship construction at the Standifer Wood Shipyard located in Kenton, Portland, Oregon.

scopecontent.p: Thirty two (32) B W photoprints of ship construction at the Standifer Wood Shipyard located in Kenton, Portland, Oregon. Contains: nine (9) photos of the construction and launching of the SS Arvonia, Hull no.20, dates range from April to September 1918; fifteen (15) photos of the construction and launching of the SS Belding, Hull no. 19, dates range from October 1917 to November 1918; seven (7) photos of the construction and launching of the SS Montezuma, Hull no. 18, dates range from February to July 1918; one (1) photo of "Miss Vera Saunders" ready to christen the SS Umatilla, Hull no. 17, dated July 13, 1918; three (3) photoprints of the North Portland Yard (Kenton Wood Shipyard) of the G.M. Standifer Construction Company (aka Standifer - Clarkson Shipyard); dates range from January 1917 to July 1918.

acqinfo.p: Acquired from the Port of Vancouver, Washington, April 2003, Library Accession 25127.

controlaccess.corpname: G. M. Standifer Construction Corporation -- Photographs.
